code: import{createSlice,createAsyncThunk}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import axios from"axios";var initialState={loading:true,products:[],error:''};export var fetchProducts=createAsyncThunk('products/fetchProducts',function(){return axios.get('https://63578faac26aac906f2cbf30.mockapi.io/products').then(function(response){return response.data;});});var productsSlice=createSlice({name:'products',initialState:initialState,extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addCase(fetchProducts.pending,function(state){state.loading=true;});builder.addCase(fetchProducts.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.products=action.payload;});builder.addCase(fetchProducts.rejected,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.products=[];state.error=action.error.message;});}});export default productsSlice.reducer;
